name: Youdao Translator
author: Li Xiang

sections.description: Translates a blog by Youdao Translation Engine. First you must apply a key from the website http://fanyi.youdao.com/fanyiapi. After uploading this plugin click ‘Activate’ and enter your Youdao Tranlation API site and key to enable the translator in the configuration menu.

short_description: Translates a blog by Youdao Translation Engine. First you must apply a key from the website http://fanyi.youdao.com/fanyiapi. After uploading this plugin click 'Activate' and enter your Youdao Tranlation API site and key to enable the translator in the configuration menu.
